certifications: Cisco Certified Network Associate CCNA (Routing & switching)

experiences.company: Antriksha Softtech PVT. LTD. Delhi, India
responsibilities: Providing network and desktop support and performing troubleshooting to resolve issues.
Maintaining company servers, computers, printers, access points, and other devices.
Deleting old script of routers & switches and creating new scripts.
Performing configuration & troubleshooting of Cisco routing switching platforms.
Performing day-to-day maintenance, data-backup, and support.
All types of printer configuration and Troubleshooting.
Knowledge on GRE and Tunneling protocols.
Collaborating with vendors to locate replacement components and resolve advance problems.
Communicating with Service providers to log tickets for link issues. Communicated with different types of service providers Airtel, TATA, BT, AT&T, MCI Verizon, Vodafone etc.
Updating management on a regular basis through reports via email.

userDetails.name: Maneesh
skills: Clear understanding of  OSI reference models & TCP/IP stack.
TCP/IP  addressing, subnetting, FLSM, VLSM, & supernetting.
Hands on experience for configuration & Tshoot of Cisco routers & switches
Hands on experience for routing protocol in static, dynamic: RIP, OSPF, EIGRP & BGP.
Hands on experience for network security like NAT, ACL, Port-Security, DHCP snoofing.
Hands on experience for traffic filters using standard and extended lists , Distribute lists and route-maps
Hands on experience for Ether-Channel , VLAN , VTP , STP , SVI, Inter-Vlan.
Hands on experience for Gateway load balancing protocols HSRP, VRRP, GLBP
